segments.text: The sunlight filters in through the open window, creating a beautiful backdrop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the garden through the panes, all bright and orderly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet inside, everything feels slightly chaotic, with that water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the woman hasn’t noticed the mess forming at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is risking it all, teetering on the edge of that stool to grab cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a rush of anger at how oblivious everyone seems to the impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, so eager and ready; her excitement is palpable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is the kind of scene that could turn from sweet to sour in an instant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the delighted giggles they’ll share if it goes well.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But if that stool tips over, all of that joy can shatter in a second.
segments.speaker: PAR
